messages.subject: Northeast Unschooling Conference Hotel
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks! The Northeast Unschooling conference is coming right up!  It s  Memorial Day weekend in Peabody, Massachusetts (outside of Boston) at the  Marriott
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks!
The Northeast Unschooling conference is coming right up! It's Memorial Day
weekend in Peabody, Massachusetts (outside of Boston) at the Marriott Hotel.

For more information about the conference, go to
_http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/_ (http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/)

The Marriott has extended our special rate of $89/night for another week,
until May 10. The hotel offers a nice indoor pool and fitness center, internet
in all rooms, a restaurant in the building, and a friendly staff who have
enjoyed unschoolers in the past. You can make reservations, asking for the
Northeast Unschooling Conference rate, by calling 800-228-9290 or 978-977-9700.

If you have any questions about the conference, you can e-mail or call me at
978-744-4796.
Kathryn Baptista, Conference Coordinator

Come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference, Memorial Day Weekend, May
26-28, 2006 in Peabody, Massachusetts! www.NortheastUnschoolingConference.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
